itemList:CategoryData=new CategoryData(this.categoryData) ngOnInit() { console.log(this.itemList) } onCategoryClicked(id:number){ this.categoryList = this.itemList.published.find(item=>item.id===id)?.subcategories || [] console.log(this.categoryList) } onOptionClick(option:string){ if(option==="Newest First"){ } else if(option==="Oldest First"){ } else if(option==="A to Z"){ } else{ } this.selectedOption = option console.log(this.selectedOption) } }
